description.value:
Element aether; Type utility (Su); Level 3; Burn 0

You can gather strands of aether twisted and warped by your experiences in the Spellscar Desert, and wind them so tightly that they explode, creating a primal magic event with a CR equal to your kineticist level. See pages 12â€“13 of Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Magic for more information on primal magic events.
